pr_title: Integrate Dependency Checker Plugin into pom.client.xml

timeline.message: Add plugin to run dependency checker instead of pulling from GitHub and building in the pipeline

timeline.bodyText: Update title to say code coverage and dependencies
timeline.author: JonathanGiles
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -55,7 +55,7 @@ jobs:
       displayName: 'Generate aggregate code coverage report'

replies.bodyText: Updating to Generate aggregate code coverage and dependency report
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: What's up with the line wrapping?
timeline.author: JonathanGiles

replies.bodyText: IntelliJ auto formatting breaking lines after 120 characters, will update my configuration to ignore XML files (or set it to something large like 200 characters).
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.message: Reverted accidental pom reformating and renamed pipeline step to include that it generates the dependency report as well
Add dependency checker plugin to the versioning tool

timeline.bodyText: You will need to update the link in /eng/code-quality-reports/src/main/resources/index.html to change based on this file rename.
timeline.author: JonathanGiles
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -86,31 +86,14 @@ jobs:
         artifactName: coverage
         targetPath: eng/jacoco-test-coverage/target/site/
 
-    - script: |
-        git clone https://github.com/JonathanGiles/DependencyChecker.git
-        mkdir input && cp eng/DependencyChecker/client_dependencies.json input/dependencies.json
-      displayName: 'Download dependency checker'
-
-    - task: Maven@3
-      displayName: 'Analyze dependencies'
-      inputs:
-        mavenPomFile: 'DependencyChecker/core/pom.xml'
-        options: '-Dexec.args="-showall -dependencymanagement"'
-        mavenOptions: '$(MemoryOptions) $(LoggingOptions)'
-        javaHomeOption: 'JDKVersion'
-        jdkVersionOption: '1.11'
-        jdkArchitectureOption: 'x64'
-        publishJUnitResults: false
-        goals: 'clean package exec:java'
-
     - pwsh: |
         $(Build.SourcesDirectory)/eng/DependencyGraph/gen-dep-graph-data.ps1
       displayName: Generate Interdependency Report Data
 
     - pwsh: |
         copy -r target/staging $(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory)
         copy eng/code-quality-reports/src/main/resources/index.html $(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory)
-        copy output/dependencies.html (Join-Path $(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory) "staging")
+        copy output/pom.client.html (Join-Path $(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory) "staging")

replies.bodyText: Should I remove the link out to the SpotBugs aggregate report as well since that doesn't get generated anymore?
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.message: Updated location of dependencies file in the overview page
